title: "R Code"

```{r echo = FALSE}
scdb_jc = read.csv("SCDB_2024_01_justiceCentered_Citation.csv")
scdb_cc = read.csv("SCDB_2024_01_caseCentered_Citation.csv")
library(dplyr)
```


### Create a `justiceLastName` variable based on the `justiceName` variable
```{r}
scdb_jc$justiceLastName <- sub(".*?([A-Z][a-z]+)[0-9]*$", "\\1", scdb_jc$justiceName)
```
Create a table to compare the `justiceName` variable to the `justiceLastName` variable
```{r}
print(unique(scdb_jc[, c("justiceName", "justiceLastName")]), row.names = FALSE)
```

### Number of decisions per term
```{r}
# library(dplyr)
scdb_cc %>%
group_by(term) %>%
summarize(totalDecisions = length(unique(caseId))) %>%
head(10)
```
